title: Online Higher Education Teaching Methods and Assessment Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of foundational online education concepts and practical experience in corporate settings
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented training emphasizing workplace applicability for current professionals.

learning_goals: Effective online teaching methods can be designed using a mixed-methods research approach (Delphi technique + survey)
Learner experience-based online assessment tools can be developed and validated
Practical educational strategies applicable in limited technological environments can be proposed

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
